repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a manuscript of the Bhāṣāpariccheda, with the commentary Siddhāntamuktāvalī. Front blank folio with something incised in Granth script. Colophon is in Telugu script. It is transcribed in VOHD II,7: p: 941 entry. 2820. prajotpatti-nāma saṃvatsaraṃ tai māsaṃ 13 teti veḷḷikiḷamai anaikki y inta muktāvaliprabhai eḷuṭi āccutu.

msItem.title: Bhāṣāpariccheda, with Siddhāntamuktāvalī
msItem.author: Viśvanātha Pañcānana Bhaṭṭācārya

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 39 pp:126-127 VOHD II,7: p: 941 entry. 2820

msItem.incipit:
1v 1 kāmākṣīpadapāyojejalptvāmuktāvalīprabhā . śrīrāyadharasihmākhye paṇditena cikīrṣyate tatra praripsitagranthaparisamāptī virodhivi?? hevi???
1v 2 na vicakṣaṇāṃ parameśvaraprārthanāṃ ādauniścaya nātiptathāmaṇikṛteti cuḍāmaṇī kṛteti acuḍāmaṇiḥ saṃpadyamānaḥ kṛtaḥ cuḍāmaṇiḥ kṛtaḥ cuḍāmaṇikṛto vidhuḥ yena sa nayena
msItem.explicit: 121v 4 bhāvāt na caivaṃ sati tasyābhedaprasaṃgaḥ pracinasya iti vā vācyaṃ apracinamānābhedaprasaṃga iti vācyaṃ
msItem.colophon: prajotpatti-nāma saṃvatsaraṃ tai māsaṃ 13 teti veḷḷikiḷamai anaikki y inta muktāvaliprabhai eḷuṭi āccutu

extent.measure: 2 guard folio and 1 blank folio 121 written folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in the left margin on the verso of the folio.

additions.desc: Front blank folio with something incised in Granth script. śrīguruścaraṇāravinde namaḥ at the centre of the folio.
hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin on 1v.

origin.origDate: The text was produced on the 13th day of the Hindu month of pauṣa month of the Thai samvatsar, which roughly corresponds to a day between the middle of January and the middle of February of the year 1871, according to the colophon.

listBibl.bibl:
Nyāyasiddhāntamuktāvalī Viśvanātha Nyāyapañcānana Bhaṭṭācārya, Nṛsiṃhadeva Śāstrī Vyāsa Prakāśana, Vārāṇasī, 1990
Nyāyasiddhāntamuktāvalī Viśvanātha Nyāyapañcānana Bhaṭṭācārya, Keśava Rāmarāva Jośi Bhāṇḍākara Prācyavidyā Saṃśodhana Mandira, Puṇe 1985
Nyāyasiddhāntamuktāvalī By K R Joshi Bhandarkar Oriental Research Institute, Poona, India 1985

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.
